WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is actually beneficial as it helps against tooltip cutoffs
WorkItem.Description:
With an open Upgrade List, make the list's window smaller vertically. Scroll down to the bottom items (I had to do this because the set listing was off the bottom of my screen). Then attempt to re-size the List window vertically.
 
Instead of pulling the upper part of the list back into the pane, the window pulls up white space to fill from the bottom.
 
Like I said, minor. Hope I described it well enough; if need be, I can show roncli and let him translate it into proper geek-speak.
WorkItem.Summary: Minor issue with Upgrade List window scrolling
